column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Because I had not tried any other Chicago style pizza at the time I tried Lou Malnati's I felt it wasn't fair to give it the full five stars. Plus
column2: the server waiting our table was not as attentive as he could have been. Other than taking our order and bringing our food
column3: he checked on us maybe about one more time. It was somewhat busy and I understand but I noticed other tables were getting just a little more attention than ours.
